extendedInfo.description: Roxio PhotoShow â Facebook Edition is a free app that makes it easy to create impressive photo slideshows right on your Android phone and share them directly on Facebook. You donât need an existing PhotoShow account to use this app. And for a limited time, itâs FREE!  (NOTE: This requires installation of Flash - Adobe AIR. You will be automatically prompted if not already installed.) Share your experiences virtually realtime, before they become distant memories. With Roxio PhotoShow â Facebook Edition, itâs so easy to give your pictures the attention they deserve and make sure that they stand out above the rest. Say goodbye to boring Facebook albums. PhotoShows are much more interesting for your Facebook friends to view. And since you can take pictures, then create and publish your photo slideshow all from your Android devices, thereâs no need to sync your photos to your computer before posting.  Itâs fast and easy with Roxio PhotoShow â Facebook Edition.Just select photos from your Android device or pick them from one of your Facebook albums, then personalize and animate your show with one of 4 professionally designed styles. When youâre done, publish your interactive PhotoShow directly to your Facebook Wall for your friends to view, comment on, and "Like".Posting photos on Facebook from Android devices is now easier, more dynamic, and fun!Creating and sharing your photo slideshow is as easy as 1-2-3.  Select, Personalize and Share.1. Select photos from your Android phone, existing Facebook photo albums or even take new photos with the camera on your Android device.2. Personalize and animate with one of 4 styles: Dissolve, Carousel, Matrix or Stack. Or swipe your photos to view them at your own pace.3. Share your slideshow of pictures with family and friends on Facebook and let the feedback start rolling in!Requirements:- Android v2.2 or higher- Flash Adobe AIR for Android (available free for compatible devices from the Android Market

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: Slideshow works but it errors out when trying to connect to facebook.
reviews.author: Ron Smith

reviews.title: Easy to use but...
reviews.comment: lacks features such as add background music and narration; not used enough to be in main memory. Should be able to move to card.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would b good if worked
reviews.comment: Simple and great concept but didn\'t work. Wished it reverted to the home page after logging in successfully instead of have to press back in which it logs me out. I agree with the other reviews of how it should include a crop and rotating option with possibly a way to add an mp3 background music. Would b great if we can also save our shows to our SD\'s too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: SEEMS TO BE ABOVE AVERAGE BUT JUST GETTING STARTED WITH THIS APP. SO I WILL GIVE A MORE FULL AND COMPERHENSIVE REVIEW ONCE I HAVE SOME TIME TO ACTUALLY SPEND WITH THE APP AND GET THE FULL EFFECT OF WHAT IT HAS TO OFFER AND THEN I WILL GIVE EVERYONE OUT THERE WONDERING IF THIS APPLICATION IS RIGHT FOR THEM; THE PRO\'S&CON\'S OF MY PERSONAL IN-DEPTH EXPERIENCE FROM EVERY ANGLE..BUT, FOR MYSELF JUST GETTING STARTED IT SEEMS TO BE A ROCK SOLID APPLICATION SEND I WAS SOLD ON DOWNLOADING IT WHEN I CAME ACROSS IT BECAUSE IT HAS AN EYE CATCHER AND FROM WHAT I READ SEEMS TO BE VERY PROMISING.SO, AS IT STANDS FOR NOW I WOULD SAY GO AHEAD AND FIVE STRAIGHT IN AND LET\'S EXPLORE THE POSSIBILITIES.THANKS, FOR TAKING THE TIME TO READ MY REVIEW AND HOPE YOU ENJOY AS I THINK I WILL! reviews.comment: Did not work, did not run picture show. Double posting to fb-pictures + picture show. FC after reaching an unknown limit. I could only load 5 pics.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I am a long time user of the full edition of Roxio Photoshow & love this mini version. Wish they could add the ability to include background music.

reviews.title: Not uploading
reviews.comment: I like how the app works to make slide shows.  However, when trying to share I have issues with keyboard double typing and won\'t upload to Facebook.
